MAIN.TITLE: Pricing
MAIN.SUBTITLE: Choose the plan that fits you more

BEGINNER.TITLE: Beginner
BEGINNER.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for individuals or small startups, even with no accounting experience.

FEATURES.AI_UPLOADS: AI-powered certificate uploads for quick conversion.
FEATURES.AUTO_SUGGESTIONS: Auto-suggestions for assets, receivables, and payables.
FEATURES.CREATE_TEAMS: Create up to 3 teams to share data and ledger.
FEATURES.ACCEPT_TASKS: Accept tasks from businesses or accountants on the platform.
FEATURES.BEST_FOR: Exploring basic features for daily needs

PROFESSIONAL.TITLE: Professional
PROFESSIONAL.DESCRIPTION: Great for SMBs, accountants, or bookkeeping firms needing advanced tools.

FEATURES.UNLIMITED_AI_UPLOADS: Certificate uploads with faster and unlimited AI processing.
FEATURES.POST_REQUESTS: Post requests on the matching platform.
FEATURES.ASSET_TAGS: Free 10 asset tags for easier tracking.
FEATURES.SUPPORT_USERS: Supports up to 10 users for each team with expansion options.
FEATURES.BEST_FOR: Boosting team efficiency, ideal for SMBs
FEATURES.CUSTOMER_SUPPORT: Chat + up to 24 hours of tech support/month
FEATURES.AI_FEATURES: Option to hide AI chats and anonymize

ENTERPRISE.TITLE: Enterprise
ENTERPRISE.DESCRIPTION: Built for large companies or accounting firms focused on security and efficiency.

FEATURES.ASSET_TAGS: Free 100 asset tags for easier tracking.
FEATURES.FINANCIAL_REPORTS: Advanced reports, multi-company consolidation, and custom needs
FEATURES.MATCHING_PLATFORM: Unlimited, with priority listing, top ads, and advanced promotion
FEATURES.CUSTOMER_SUPPORT: Chat + up to 48 hours of tech support/month
FEATURES.EXTRAS: Includes 100 asset tags, offline deployment, and hardware integration
FEATURES.AI_FEATURES: Customizable AI connected to company reports

CONTACT.TITLE: For more information
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Customer Support Hours: Weekdays, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
